reviews.text: Love location , I didn‚Äôt like my quesadillas that much because I messed up and chose the corn option . Besides that the food was amazing .. lovely family run location

Hoy hice un pedido para recoger. Casi todo bien hasta que fui a recoger mi orden. Me enter√© de que la persona que tom√≥ mi orden no estaba ah√≠ trabajando, sino que era un centro de llamadas.La persona fue muy amable, pero me hubiera gustado que estuviera en el lugar para que indicara c√≥mo quer√≠a mi pedido a las personas que est√°n realizando los pedidos. Fui a recoger mi orden, pregunt√© por los detalles de mi pedido y no sab√≠an con exactitud c√≥mo hacerlo. Cuando llegu√© a mi casa para degustar la comida y ver si mi pedido estaba correcto, me di cuenta de que no. Yo ped√≠ dos tortas de birria y una orden de tacos de birria, y en vez de eso me dieron tres tortas de birria. Bueno, dije, no hay mucho problema con eso.Pero entonces mi esposa pidi√≥ unos tacos de pastor y no ten√≠an sabor, y el cilantro que le pusieron no era muy fresco que digamos. Tambi√©n yo ped√≠ unos tacos placeros: uno de chorizo con papas no estuvo tan mal, y otro de chile relleno, pero estuvo espantoso. El chile se ve√≠a que no era de hoy ni de ayer. Cuando lo asaron, se les pas√≥ y lo quemaron, pero a√∫n as√≠ lo usaron. Y para terminar, en la p√°gina algunos precios cambian. Por ejemplo, los tacos placeros cuestan $5.99 y me cobraron $7.99, y los tacos birria cuestan $15.99 y me cobraron $17.99. De todos modos, no los recib√≠ porque recib√≠ una torta birria que cuesta $13.99. Espero que mejoren porque son nuevos en el vecindario.

Been waiting a while to try this place out, finally ordered and got delivery. I chose the Burrito combo since it came with fries and drink, and I gotta say that burrito was insanely good, the meat was very tender, the rice and beans complimented well with the meat, and the cheese and sour cream on top added flavor. And the fries were pretty crispy and nicely salted. Would order from them again and try some of their other dishes.
Great atmosphere, amazing customer service, food is amazing 10 out of 10 in my book, perfect for late night tacos

This is my second visit and I am not disappointed. The service is excellent with everyone being so patient and helpful. The food is delicious and I loved participating in the prize wheel! Jovani was very kind and friendly. I will be recommending this spot in the future and look forward to coming back!

I love this place. I live near the area so I always walked past it when they were under construction. But just by the look, I knew it was going to be a great restaurant. I was just patiently waiting for them to finish and when I finally got to try it out, it did not disappoint. The food is 100% traditional. And super delicious and fresh they make it right there for you. The customer service was incredible. They have a very large crew, so you won‚Äôt be waiting long. They take takeout, delivery and dine-in. And the best part is the price for everything is very affordable.

For my first time ordering I ordered a flour Chicken quesadilla combo (comes w/ drink) for $11.99
Tacos Dorados En vase Combo (comes w/ drink) for $13.99
And I also got to try their Nachos (comes w/ drink), you can choose how you want it. For just $13.49

If you live in the Bronx and you want to try a new authentic Mexican restaurant, you should try this one. This is your sign‚òùÔ∏è

EXCELLENT.  Have eaten here now 4X so I feel like I can write a review.  Delicious, real food.  Tacos are by far the best in area and made with high quality ingredients.  Beef (carne asada) tacos are exceptional...lean & tasty, expertly cooked beef arrives on your plate piping hot.  But all of the tacos are very good.

This place is spotless and clean, covered in white ceramic tile like a Mexican marketplace.  It's fun to eat in at the counters.
We haven't ordered for takeout or delivery as yet.

I was so excited to hit this place up because I was looking for a solid taco place that wasn‚Äôt so far from me! As soon as I walked in I was met with the warmest and kindest people ever! The atmosphere felt like home! I had the beef al pastor soft tacos and my sister had beef al pastor hard tacos. DELICIOUS! Especially with the sauces that they give you!! I definitely HAVE to come back to get my taco fix, love this place already!!
Came to this place countless of times and their tacos are my go to it‚Äôs so good. Every time I step in I‚Äôm greeted with smiles and such positivity I love this place.

This is the second time I ordered from this location thru Uber Eats and they left out the beverages from the order that‚Äôs 4 beverages missing that I paid for and don‚Äôt get. They can‚Äôt blame Uber, I ordered before and missed beverages. Never ordering from here again. Never will I stop in to eat there. If they‚Äôre regularly leaving out items then it‚Äôs not a mistake it‚Äôs stealing from customers.

My family and I drove all the way to The Bronx to try the food here. We ordered vegetarian tacos, shrimp tacos, and quesabirrias. Everything was delicious! üòã Oh, and shout out to the friendly staff.
Best tacos doradod iv ever had

First time order from here I'm so disgusted I asked for flautas they gave me hard tacos it was so hard my tooth almost broke it had to be very old not fresh because I placed the order and the food came in 10 minutes none of the food looked fresh I ordered two meals of burritos with fries I asked for crispy fries they gave me cold soggy fries and two cold burritos one of the burritos was split open like someone was trying to eat it the so called flautas were not flautas I've never seen flautas like that in my life almost 50 bucks for food in the trash I ask for money back they said they don't do refunds only different food do you think I want more food from them first time and never again don't go there

Fui hordene  4 tacos y espec√≠ficamente ped√≠ que a un taco no Sebolla que Hera para m√≠ ni√±o todos los tacos ten√≠an sebolla  y para el aria que hes  seme hiso  demasiado caro no lo recomiendo en el aria hay mejores opciones a hora entiendo el porque nunca hay gente comprando solo una oportunidad selesda yo no vuelvo a este lugar hojo en la ventanilla  en d√≥nde est√°n preparando tus alimentos suerte que dios los vendiga

I was there for the opening  and everyone was so nice but the second time, the guy at the counter was so rude and i didn‚Äôt get my drinks and today I went to get same order and I get the drink but guy was like if he doesn‚Äôt want to attend me  or something so I don‚Äôt mean I don‚Äôt want to people being so nice or fake but if you gonna put someone in the counter at least try to be nice w everyone

The only thing that had flavor were the nachos. Only because of all the toppings that are mixed in.

I hope they fix the taste.

Fui a la taqueria y page dos ordenes de tacos birria,al instante pedi cambiar mi orden por otra orden que concidere mucho mejor y incluso mas cara y solo gritaron no la orden ya se facturo, osea las meseras me dieron lo que ellas quisieron sin importar que es mi dinero, pesimo servicio el cliente debe ser primero y preoridad dar un buen servicio ni siquiera habia pasado 1 minuto del pago de la orden, fui fans de sus tacos borria anteriores con una mejor cantidad y con un consome muy rico , el que recibi era tan solo una sopita de agua y silantro :(  y de un tama√±o muy peque√±o. Lo unico bueno fue que ahora agregaron una soda a la orden.

This place was a 10/10. I loved the service and how clean it is. They are also very organized and the foot is amazing.
